TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit CustomAttributeBuilder extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._CustomAttributeBuilder

span.span: Helps build custom attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`CustomAttributeBuilder`来描述自定义特性的构造函数所返回对象。Use the `CustomAttributeBuilder` object returned by the constructor to describe the custom attribute. 将关联`CustomAttribute`与通过调用生成器实例`SetCustomAttribute`该生成器实例上的方法。Associate the `CustomAttribute` with a builder instance by calling the `SetCustomAttribute` method on that builder instance. 例如，创建`CustomAttributeBuilder`来描述的实例`AssemblyCultureAttribute`通过提供的构造函数及其参数。For example, create a `CustomAttributeBuilder` to describe an instance of `AssemblyCultureAttribute` by supplying the constructor of and its argument. 然后调用上`AssemblyBuilder`以建立关联。Then call on an `AssemblyBuilder` to establish the association. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`CustomAttributeBuilder`。The following code sample illustrates the use of `CustomAttributeBuilder`. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes an instances of the class.

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class given the constructor for the custom attribute and the arguments to the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素`constructorArgs`数组被限制为元素类型。The elements of the `constructorArgs` array are restricted to element types. 它们可以是`byte`， `sbyte`， `int`， `uint`， `long`， `ulong`， `float`， `double`， `String`， `char`， `bool`，枚举，一种类型，任何的上一个强制转换为对象或一维数组从零开始的任何以前的类型的类型。They can be `byte`, `sbyte`, `int`, `uint`, `long`, `ulong`, `float`, `double`, `String`, `char`, `bool`, an enum, a type, any of the previous types that was cast to an object, or a single-dimension, zero-based array of any of the previous types.

span.span: is static or private.
-or-

exception.span: 提供的参数数目与构造函数的调用约定所需的构造函数的参数数目不匹配。

span.span: The number of supplied arguments does not match the number of parameters of the constructor as required by the calling convention of the constructor.
-or-

exception.span: 提供的参数类型与构造函数中声明的参数类型不匹配。

span.span: The type of supplied argument does not match the type of the parameter declared in the constructor.
-or-

exception.span: 提供的参数是除 或 外的引用类型。

span.span: A supplied argument is a reference type other than or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素`constructorArgs`和`fieldValues`数组被限制为元素类型。The elements of the `constructorArgs` and `fieldValues` arrays are restricted to element types. 它们可以是`byte`， `sbyte`， `int`， `uint`， `long`， `ulong`， `float`， `double`， `String`， `char`， `bool`，枚举，一种类型，任何的上一个强制转换为对象或一维数组从零开始的任何以前的类型的类型。They can be `byte`, `sbyte`, `int`, `uint`, `long`, `ulong`, `float`, `double`, `String`, `char`, `bool`, an enum, a type, any of the previous types that was cast to an object, or a single-dimension, zero-based array of any of the previous types. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不包括中的私有字段`namedFields`。Do not include private fields in `namedFields`. 这样将导致引发时更高版本上的已完成的类型调用方法。Doing so will cause to be thrown when the method is later called on the completed type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素`constructorArgs`， `propertyValues`，或`fieldValues`数组被限制为元素类型。The elements of the `constructorArgs`, `propertyValues`, or `fieldValues` arrays are restricted to element types. 它们可以是`byte`， `sbyte`， `int`， `uint`， `long`， `ulong`， `float`， `double`， `String`， `char`， `bool`，枚举，一种类型，任何的上一个强制转换为对象或一维数组从零开始的任何以前的类型的类型。They can be `byte`, `sbyte`, `int`, `uint`, `long`, `ulong`, `float`, `double`, `String`, `char`, `bool`, an enum, a type, any of the previous types that was cast to an object, or a single-dimension, zero-based array of any of the previous types. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不包括私有属性或字段在`namedProperties`或`namedFields`。Do not include private properties or fields in `namedProperties` or `namedFields`. 这样将导致引发时更高版本上的已完成的类型调用方法。Doing so will cause to be thrown when the method is later called on the completed type.

Sub GetIDsOfNames (ByRef riid As Guid, rgszNames As IntPtr, cNames As UInteger, lcid As UInteger, rgDispId As IntPtr) Implements _CustomAttributeBuilder.GetIDsOfNames

virtual void System.Runtime.InteropServices._CustomAttributeBuilder.GetIDsOfNames(Guid % riid, IntPtr rgszNames, System::UInt32 cNames, System::UInt32 lcid, IntPtr rgDispId) = System::Runtime::InteropServices::_CustomAttributeBuilder::GetIDsOfNames;

param.name: riid
param.span: 留待将来使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

param.span: 必须为 IID_NULL。

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

param.name: rgszNames
param.span: 要映射的名称的传入数组。

span.span: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.

param.name: cNames
param.span: 要映射的名称的计数。

span.span: Count of the names to be mapped.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 要在其中解释名称的区域设置上下文。

span.span: The locale context in which to interpret the names.

param.name: rgDispId
param.span: 调用方分配的数组，用于接收与名称对应的 ID。

span.span: Caller-allocated array which receives the IDs corresponding to the names.

summary.span: 将一组名称映射为对应的一组调度标识符。

span.span: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，请参阅 MSDN 库。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.

exception.span: 此方法称为使用 COM IDispatch 接口的后期绑定。

span.span: The method is called late-bound using the COM IDispatch interface.

param.name: iTInfo
param.span: 要返回的类型信息。

span.span: The type information to return.

param.name: lcid

param.span: 接收一个指针，指向请求的类型信息对象。

summary.span: 检索对象的类型信息，然后可以使用该信息获取接口的类型信息。

span.span: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can then be used to get the type information for an interface.
